title: Governance token lock-up and mining plans
body:
Dear QIAN community members, after the discussion on governance forum, here we have three options for the governance token lock-up and mining tech solution, now it's time to vote your favorite one. Please cast your sacred vote, thanks!

The results of this vote will directly determine the success of QIAN's future governance, so please think twice before you vote.

Detailed information: https://forum.qian.finance/t/qip-1-governance-token-lock-up-and-mining-plans/202

尊敬的 QIAN 社区成员们，经过治理论坛的讨论，我们目前有了三套关于治理锁仓挖矿的技术路线，特此提交社区进行投票。请投出你庄严而神圣的选票，谢谢！

这次投票结果将会直接决定 QIAN 后续治理的成败，请大家三思而后行。

提案详细信息：https://forum.qian.finance/t/qip-1/191

Conflict solution: if the voting result is different across Ethereum and BSC vote space, there will be two set of plans on governance smart contract across these two chains, please think twice again!

冲突方案：如果本次投票的结果在以太坊和BSC两条链上不一致，则将根据投票结果在两条链部署不同的治理合约，所以请大家三思！
author: 0xDb80BD4f295623D50c2019581624454d07f070be
